TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplatePagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示 欄位，這個欄位可讓您建立自訂分頁 UI。

span.span: Represents a field that enables you to create a custom paging UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用物件，以顯示讓使用者逐頁查看資料實作的控制項所顯示的導覽控制項介面。Use the object to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the interface. (範例控制項。)您也可以使用物件，以顯示基礎資料來源，例如記錄總數目和目前的頁碼的相關資訊。(An example is the control.) You can also use the object to display information about the underlying data source, such as total number of records and the current page number. 欄位沒有任何內建的配置。The field has no built-in layout. 因此，您必須明確建立的配置範本。Therefore, you must explicitly create the layout in the template. 您可以使用階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別或內嵌樣式項目格式化內容。You can format the content by using cascading style sheets (CSS) classes or inline style elements. 您可以參考包含控制項物件使用`Container`屬性。You can reference the control that contains the object by using the `Container` property. 當您想要建立繫結運算式，以顯示所擷取的多少筆記錄的總數的頁面，以及類似的資訊時，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to create binding expressions to show how many records were retrieved, the total number of pages, and similar information. 這些繫結運算式可以使用屬性控制例如， ， ，和。These binding expressions can use properties of the control such as , , , and . 欄位會提供事件，通常用來執行工作時的按鈕中按一下範本時。The field provides the event, which is typically used to perform a task when a button in the template is clicked. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將加入欄位控制項。The following example shows how to add a field in a control. 這個範例會使用來顯示目前的頁碼、 總頁數，以及記錄總數。This example uses the to display the current page number, the total number of pages, and the total number of records. 控制項還包含兩個欄位和顯示瀏覽控制項，可讓使用者逐頁查看資料欄位。The control also contains two fields and a field to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/CS/TemplatePagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/VB/TemplatePagerFieldVB.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用事件以執行不同的動作依據 button 已按下中欄位。The following example shows how to use the event to perform a different action depending on which button was clicked in a field. 這個範例會使用顯示瀏覽控制項，可讓使用者逐頁查看資料。This example uses the to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/CS/OnPagerCommandCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/VB/OnPagerCommandVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式通常用來以動態方式將欄位加入至控制項。This constructor is typically used to dynamically add fields to a control. 若要加入以動態方式為物件控制，建立新物件。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object. 設定其屬性，將控制項加入至它，然後將它加入的欄位集合控制項。Set its properties, add controls to it, and then add it to the field collection for the control.

param.name: newField

span.span: The object to which the properties of the current instance will be copied.

summary.span: 將目前 物件的屬性複製到指定的 物件。

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法來複製目前的內容物件物件傳入`newField`參數。It is used by the method to copy the properties of the current object to the object that is passed in the `newField` parameter. ## Examples [ListView Web 伺服器控制項概觀ListView Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b4da934-2f5e-4b5a-b03d-fca5e15f85af)

para.span: 覆寫方法以複製新屬性的衍生類別中所建立的。

span.span: Override the method to copy the new properties that were created in the derived class.

para.span: 呼叫基底類別的方法，讓屬性類別也會一併複製。

span.span: Call the base class's method so that the properties of the class are also copied.

The total number of items.

summary.span: 為頁面巡覽區欄位建立使用者介面 (UI) 控制項，並將它們加入至指定的容器。

span.span: Creates the user interface (UI) controls for the pager field object and adds them to the specified container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，以供方法。The method is a helper method that is used by the method. 方法會填入所指定的物件`container`參數中所包含的子控制項範本。The method populates the object that is specified by the `container` parameter with the child controls that are contained in the template.

A new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由若要建立空的基底類別方法物件。It is used by the method of the base class to create an empty object.

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 處理 物件中發生的事件並執行適當的動作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the object and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法以處理中發生的事件物件時按下控制項內部的按鈕。It is used by the method to handle events that occur in the object when a button inside the control is clicked. 方法會叫用方法，並檢查屬性。The method invokes the method and examines the property. 如果已變更，這個方法會叫用方法，以更新的頁面內容控制項。If has changed, this method invokes the method to update the page properties of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnPagerCommand (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPagerCommand(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnPagerCommand (e As DataPagerCommandEventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnPagerCommand(System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataPagerCommandEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中按下按鈕時，會引發事件物件。The event is raised when a button is clicked in the object. 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

exception.span: 沒有 事件的處理常式。

span.span: There is no handler for the event.

para.span: 當您覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs> PagerCommand;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs> PagerCommand
Public Custom Event PagerCommand As EventHandler(Of DataPagerCommandEventArgs)
public: event EventHandler<System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataPagerCommandEventArgs ^> ^ PagerCommand;

summary.span: 按一下 物件中的按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a button is clicked in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中按下按鈕時，會引發事件物件。The event is raised when a button is clicked in a object. 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件以執行不同的動作依據 button 已按下中物件。The following example shows how to use the event to perform a different action depending on which button was clicked in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/CS/OnPagerCommandCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/VB/OnPagerCommandVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate PagerTemplate { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.ITemplate PagerTemplate
Public Overridable Property PagerTemplate As ITemplate
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ PagerTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中頁面巡覽區欄位的自訂內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager field in a control.

value.span: 範本物件，包含 控制項中頁面巡覽區欄位的自訂內容。

span.span: A template object that contains the custom content for the pager field in a control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 的資料分頁。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for paging data. 範本通常包含逐頁查看資料的導覽控制項。The template usually contains navigation controls to page through data. 它也可以用來顯示基礎資料來源，例如總記錄數或目前的頁碼的相關資訊。It can also be used to display information about the underlying data source, such as the total number of records or the current page number. 若要以宣告方式建立自訂範本，將`PagerTemplate`元素內物件。To create a custom template declaratively, put a `PagerTemplate` element inside the object. 然後，您可以加入至內容`PagerTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents to the `PagerTemplate` element. 您可以參考繫結中的運算式中的控制項範本使用`Container`屬性。You can reference the control in binding expressions in the template by using the `Container` property. 這個屬性提供的屬性存取控制項，其包含， ，和屬性。This property provides access to the properties of the control, which includes the , , and properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將控制項加入存取屬性的範本控制項。The following example shows how to add controls to the template that access properties of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/CS/TemplatePagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/VB/TemplatePagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]
